extendedInfo.description: Grillo is intended for therapy students for tracking client hours for graduation.  Grillo allows a user to track clients and email spreadsheet reports.  Grillo has the ability to input therapy types and location sites that can be customized to their program and practicum sites.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This app has worked great for me. I do wish there was a way to edit entries once saved, other than that the app is awesome!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So excited..
reviews.comment: ....to be able to keep my hour count with me
reviews.author: A Google User
